About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Mr Emmason has Bachelor of Science-BS, Computer Science, University of Witwatersrand, Johannesburg, South Africa. Is a Technologist having developed various applications for companies like Microsoft, Cisco and Banks also cloud based apps, in the early days of internet banking he developed a transactional server application linking to e-wallet for the bank that earned him an award, currently Mr Emmason is a Senior Developer at a consulting firm called Embtec

Embtec Ecommerce

Full / Mern /Mean Stack Engineering

As a full stack Developer/Engineer i handle all the work of client side, Server Side, and Database Engineering, even systems engineering.Depending on the project on the languages like C, Angular, React/ Native, Redux. MongoDB, Express, Javascript, NodeJS, Grunt, Gulp etc

Designed a Jobhub.net App

Front End Developer

Having to work on this project using frontend technologies like Html, Css, Javascript, Bootstrap, react. The features of this application has a pool of information of clients and customers where candidates identifications are tracke whislt applying for job and kept on the record as verified or not. That garantees the employer the confidence to hire the right person for the right job

Webworks Centruim

Data Base

An Engineering with out a data base or data scientist delieverables skipped a trace. That is where Mr Emmason who have piloted a databse project from start to Finish, specifically My sql, Microsoft Sql, Postgresql,all these relational database has powered a data structure with a pilot project. Morever not leaving MongoDB, Firebase etc all the nosql in the pipeline
